NORWEGIAN SEA.
NORWAY.
DNC 20, DNC 21.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL FURTHER
   NOTICE BY M/V POLARCUS ADIRA AND
   M/V POLARCUS ALIMA TOWING 12 9000 METER LONG
   CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   63-36N 001-43E, 62-54N 005-33E,
   63-43N 005-33E, 64-14N 002-45E.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1723/18.
